text: Aur jab unn per koi azab waqey hota to yun kehtay kay aey musa! Humaray liye apney rab say iss baat ki dua ker dijiye! Jiss ka uss ney aap say ehad ker rakha hai agar aap iss azab ko hum say hata den to hum zaroor zaroor aap kay kehney say eman ley aayen gay aur hum bani israeel ko bhi (raah ker kay) aap kay humrah ker den gay
